## Checklist

- [ ] Lint, typecheck, and tests pass locally
- [ ] Schemas updated (OpenAPI/GraphQL/JSON/Avro) and clients regenerated
- [ ] Docs updated (/docs/api-specs.md, /docs/data-models.md) if applicable
- [ ] Changelog updated (/docs/CHANGELOG.md)
- [ ] ADR added/updated if architecture decision changed
- [ ] Security review items (secrets, PII, migrations) considered
